artifacts.summary: Comprehensive analysis of metalogic architecture with dependency flow charts, mapping paths to sorry-free completeness via algebraic representation and decidability via FMP

partial_progress.details: Created research-005.md with full architecture analysis, dependency charts, and implementation roadmap

findings_summary: Algebraic path (Algebraic/) is SORRY-FREE but proves AlgSatisfiable<->AlgConsistent, not standard valid->provable
FMP path has 1 sorry (compositionality) and uses semantic_truth_at_v2, not standard truth_at
Representation path has 20+ sorries but is the ONLY path connecting to standard valid/truth_at
No files can be safely archived now - all are required by completeness proofs
Recommended: Build AlgebraicSemanticBridge to connect algebraic satisfiability to standard validity
recommendations: Do NOT archive any Representation/ files - they are still required
Near-term: Document architecture and mark sorry criticality
Medium-term: Build AlgebraicSemanticBridge.lean to connect algebraic path to standard completeness
Long-term: Once algebraic bridge works, archive Representation/ to Boneyard
